name: Crossroads
description: A busy crossroads serves as a meeting point for multiple travel routes, offering access to diverse destinations and information exchange, but the intersection nature creates both opportunity and danger. The transportation focus provides access to multiple destinations and trade routes, while the strategic position makes it vulnerable to bandits and military control.
atmosphere: Four roads converge at a central crossroads marked by weathered signposts pointing to distant cities. Travelers, merchants, and messengers gather to rest and exchange news. The air carries dust from countless feet and hooves. Roadside inns and trading posts serve the constant traffic.
